---
title: "Extraction of M and SDs from Coles et al. 2024a for demand characteristics meta-analysis"
output: html_document
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

```{r}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls())

# load packages
library('tidyverse')

# load data
d <- read.csv("metaware_replication_clean.csv") %>% 
  select(sub : happy)

# prep data
d <- d %>% 
  # restructure data
  pivot_wider(names_from = block.num,
              values_from = happy) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = trial,
              values_from = c(`1`, `2`)) %>% 
  
  # average across blocks
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(hap = mean(c(`1_hap`, `2_hap`)),
         neu = mean(c(`1_neu`, `2_neu`))
         ) %>% 
  
  # calculate difference score
  mutate(dif = hap - neu) %>% 
  ungroup()

# examine difference score
d %>%
  filter(!is.na(dif)) %>% 
  group_by(demand) %>% 
  summarise(m.happy = mean(hap,
                           na.rm = T),
            sd.happy = sd(hap,
                          na.rm = T),
            n = n())

# examine difference in difference
d %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dif)) %>% 
  group_by(demand) %>% 
  summarise(m.dif = mean(dif, na.rm = T),
            sd.dif = sd(dif, na.rm = T),
            n = n())
```
